short_description: This function computes the characteristic values.
long_description: This function computes the characteristic values from the join of two tables. These two tables, conversion count and total count, are generated by the nPath function. This function will output the combination (set), the size, and the characteristic value for that set.

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: A table output by the GenerateCombination or SortCombination function.
input_tables.description: A table output by the GenerateCombination or SortCombination function.
